page.title: 13Day in the Life of a Pupil
page.content: My name is Jonathan Young.I am 11 yrs. old and attend Whalley School. {Wednesday 3rd July 1985 { }I awoke at 7:40 and after a cereal breakfast left home with my 2 sisters, travelling 6 miles by car to{school. At 9:00am I joined my 32 classmates in the hall for assembly, a short service of hymns and prayers. A register of meals/attendance was taken followed by maths and P.E. After playtime we did English work from textbooks.Lunchtime was 12:00 when I had a packed lunch.My friend had a school meal of fish/chips & tart /custard.School restarted at 1:05pm. I then had craft (canework) followed by music-singing.School finished at 3:25pm.Back home I played out in the garden until dinner at 6:00pm.After I watched 'Dallas' on television,going to bed at 9:30pm.
